;---------------------------------------------------------;
; SAM Ortho Transition Support
; Added By Durfsurn 2.08.2020
;---------------------------------------------------------;
;---SAM 5 to Street/SAM Transitions---
;revised by Tarkus 15 April 2021

;to/from Street
0x5E54B500,1,0,0x5E5C0080,0,0=0x5E54B500,1,0,0x5E5C5500,2,0
0x5E54B500,3,0,0x5E5C0080,0,0=0x5E54B500,3,0,0x5E5C5500,2,0
0x5E54B500,1,0,0x5E5C0080,2,0=0x5E54B500,1,0,0x5E5C5500,2,0
0x5E54B500,3,0,0x5E5C0080,2,0=0x5E54B500,3,0,0x5E5C5500,2,0

;rot 2 point (SAM Set number less than current)-

;to/from SAM 0
0x5E54B500,1,0,0x5E5C0000,0,0=0x5E54B500,1,0,0x5E5C0500,2,0
0x5E54B500,3,0,0x5E5C0000,0,0=0x5E54B500,3,0,0x5E5C0500,2,0

;to/from SAM 1
0x5E54B500,1,0,0x5E5C1100,0,0=0x5E54B500,1,0,0x5E5C1500,2,0
0x5E54B500,3,0,0x5E5C1100,0,0=0x5E54B500,3,0,0x5E5C1500,2,0

;to/from SAM 2
0x5E54B500,1,0,0x5E5C2200,0,0=0x5E54B500,1,0,0x5E5C2500,2,0
0x5E54B500,3,0,0x5E5C2200,0,0=0x5E54B500,3,0,0x5E5C2500,2,0

;to/from SAM 3
0x5E54B500,1,0,0x5E5C3300,0,0=0x5E54B500,1,0,0x5E5C3500,2,0
0x5E54B500,3,0,0x5E5C3300,0,0=0x5E54B500,3,0,0x5E5C3500,2,0

;to/from SAM 4
0x5E54B500,1,0,0x5E5C4400,0,0=0x5E54B500,1,0,0x5E5C4500,2,0
0x5E54B500,3,0,0x5E5C4400,0,0=0x5E54B500,3,0,0x5E5C4500,2,0

;-rot 0 point (SAM Set number greater than current)-

;to/from SAM 6
0x5E54B500,1,0,0x5E5C6600,0,0=0x5E54B500,1,0,0x5E5C5600,0,0
0x5E54B500,3,0,0x5E5C6600,0,0=0x5E54B500,3,0,0x5E5C5600,0,0

;to/from SAM 7
0x5E54B500,1,0,0x5E5C7700,0,0=0x5E54B500,1,0,0x5E5C5700,0,0
0x5E54B500,3,0,0x5E5C7700,0,0=0x5E54B500,3,0,0x5E5C5700,0,0

;to/from SAM 8
0x5E54B500,1,0,0x5E5C8800,0,0=0x5E54B500,1,0,0x5E5C5800,0,0
0x5E54B500,3,0,0x5E5C8800,0,0=0x5E54B500,3,0,0x5E5C5800,0,0

;to/from SAM 9
0x5E54B500,1,0,0x5E5C9900,0,0=0x5E54B500,1,0,0x5E5C5900,0,0
0x5E54B500,3,0,0x5E5C9900,0,0=0x5E54B500,3,0,0x5E5C5900,0,0

;to/from SAM 10 (A)
0x5E54B500,1,0,0x5E5CAA00,0,0=0x5E54B500,1,0,0x5E5C5A00,0,0
0x5E54B500,3,0,0x5E5CAA00,0,0=0x5E54B500,3,0,0x5E5C5A00,0,0

;to/from SAM 11 (B)
0x5E54B500,1,0,0x5E5CBB00,0,0=0x5E54B500,1,0,0x5E5C5B00,0,0
0x5E54B500,3,0,0x5E5CBB00,0,0=0x5E54B500,3,0,0x5E5C5B00,0,0

;to/from SAM 12 (C)
0x5E54B500,1,0,0x5E5CCC00,0,0=0x5E54B500,1,0,0x5E5C5C00,0,0
0x5E54B500,3,0,0x5E5CCC00,0,0=0x5E54B500,3,0,0x5E5C5C00,0,0

;to/from SAM 13 (D)
0x5E54B500,1,0,0x5E5CDD00,0,0=0x5E54B500,1,0,0x5E5C5D00,0,0
0x5E54B500,3,0,0x5E5CDD00,0,0=0x5E54B500,3,0,0x5E5C5D00,0,0

;to/from SAM 14 (E)
0x5E54B500,1,0,0x5E5CEE00,0,0=0x5E54B500,1,0,0x5E5C5E00,0,0
0x5E54B500,3,0,0x5E5CEE00,0,0=0x5E54B500,3,0,0x5E5C5E00,0,0

;to/from SAM 15 (F)
0x5E54B500,1,0,0x5E5CFF00,0,0=0x5E54B500,1,0,0x5E5C5F00,0,0
0x5E54B500,3,0,0x5E5CFF00,0,0=0x5E54B500,3,0,0x5E5C5F00,0,0

;--SAM 5--
;OxO + (5e64#)
;TLA-3
0x5e54b500,1,0,0x51001000,1,0=0x5e54b500,1,0,0x5e640500,1,0
0x5e54b500,1,0,0x51001000,3,0=0x5e54b500,1,0,0x5e640500,3,0
0x5e54b500,3,0,0x51001000,1,0=0x5e54b500,3,0,0x5e640500,1,0
0x5e54b500,3,0,0x51001000,3,0=0x5e54b500,3,0,0x5e640500,3,0

0x5e54b500,1,0,0x51011000,3,0=0x5e54b500,1,0,0x5e641500,3,0

;NRD-4
0x5e54b500,1,0,0x51051000,1,0=0x5e54b500,1,0,0x5e645500,1,0
0x5e54b500,1,0,0x51051000,3,0=0x5e54b500,1,0,0x5e645500,3,0

0x5e54b500,3,0,0x51051000,3,0=0x5e54b500,3,0,0x5e645500,3,0
;TLA-5
;Tile 1
0x5e54b500,1,0,0x51101000,3,0=0x5e54b500,1,0,0x5e646500,3,0
0x5e54b500,3,0,0x51101000,3,0=0x5e54b500,3,0,0x5e646500,3,0
;Tile 2 +
0x5e646500,3,0,0x51101000,1,0=0x5e646500,3,0,0x5e646500,1,0
;Tile 2 Long-T

;OWR-4
;Tile 1
0x5e54b500,1,0,0x51111000,3,0=0x5e54b500,1,0,0x5e647500,3,0
0x5e54b500,3,0,0x51111000,3,0=0x5e54b500,3,0,0x5e647500,3,0
;Tile 2 +

;Tile 2 Long-T

;OWR-5

;RD-6

0x5e64B500,3,0,0x51201080,3,0=0x5e64B500,3,0,0x5e64B580,3,0
